panels.description:
0 = DOWN
1 = UP
panels.title: Proxy Status

panels.description: - haproxy_frontend_http_responses_total = Total of HTTP responses.
panels.title: HTTP Response Codes (Total): $node

panels.description: - haproxy_frontend_http_responses_total = Total of HTTP responses.
panels.title: Error - HTTP Response Codes Ratio (4xx, 5xx): $node

panels.description:
- haproxy_frontend_requests_denied_total = Total of requests denied for security.
- haproxy_frontend_request_errors_total = Total of request errors.
panels.title: Error - Request Errors/ Requests Denied: $node

panels.description: - haproxy_frontend_current_session_rate = Current number of sessions per second over last elapsed second.
panels.title: Utilization - Current Sessions/s : $node

panels.description:
- haproxy_frontend_bytes_in_total = Current total of incoming bytes.
- haproxy_frontend_bytes_out_total Current total of outgoing bytes.
panels.title: Utilization - IN/ OUT (Bytes): $node

panels.description:
- Connection Utilization (%):
   - WARNING = 60%
   - CRITICAL = 70%

- slim [LFBS]: configured session limit (maxconn from haproxy.conf)
- scur [LFBS]: current sessions
- stot [LFBS]: cumulative number of sessions
- smax [LFBS]: max sessions
panels.title: Utilization - Frontend (Connections %): $node

panels.description:
- slim [LFBS]: configured session limit (maxconn from haproxy.conf)
- scur [LFBS]: current sessions
- stot [LFBS]: cumulative number of sessions
- smax [LFBS]: max sessions
panels.title: Frontend (Connections: Limit, Max, Current): $node

panels.description: - haproxy_backend_up = Current health status of the backend (1 = UP, 0 = DOWN).
panels.title: Backend Status: $node

panels.description: - haproxy_backend_weight = Total weight of the servers in the backend.
panels.title: Backend Weight: $node

panels.description: - haproxy_backend_current_server = Current number of active servers
panels.title: Backend Active Servers: $node

panels.description: haproxy_backend_http_responses_total = Total of HTTP responses.
panels.title: HTTP Response Codes (Total): $node

panels.description:
- haproxy_backend_connection_errors_total = Total of connection errors.
-  haproxy_backend_response_errors_total Total of response errors.
panels.title: Error - Response Errors/ Connection Errors: $node

panels.description:
- haproxy_backend_bytes_in_total = Current total of incoming bytes.
- haproxy_backend_bytes_out_total Current total of outgoing bytes.
panels.title: Utilization - IN/ OUT (Bytes): $node

panels.description:
- haproxy_backend_retry_warnings_total = Total of retry warnings.
- haproxy_backend_redispatch_warnings_total = Total of redispatch warnings.
panels.title: Availability - Redispatch Warnings/ Retry Warnings: $node

panels.description:
- haproxy_backend_max_queue = Maximum observed number of queued requests not assigned to any server.
- haproxy_backend_current_queue = Current number of queued requests not assigned to any server.
panels.title: Saturation - Number of queued requests not assigned to any server (Current/ Maximum): $node

panels.description:
- haproxy_backend_http_connect_time_average_seconds Avg. HTTP connect time for last 1024 successful connections.
- haproxy_backend_http_queue_time_average_seconds Avg. HTTP queue time for last 1024 successful connections.
- haproxy_backend_http_response_time_average_seconds Avg. HTTP response time for last 1024 successful connections.
- haproxy_backend_http_total_time_average_seconds Avg. HTTP total time for last 1024 successful connections.
panels.title: Throughput - HTTP Average Time (s) for (Connect/ Response/ Queue/ Total): $node

panels.description:
- Connection Utilization (%):
   - WARNING = 60%
   - CRITICAL = 70%

- slim [LFBS]: configured session limit (maxconn from haproxy.conf)
- scur [LFBS]: current sessions
- stot [LFBS]: cumulative number of sessions
- smax [LFBS]: max sessions
panels.title: Utilization - Backend (Connections %): $node

panels.description: - haproxy_backend_current_session_rate = Current number of sessions per second over last elapsed second.
panels.title: Utilization - Current Sessions/s : $node

panels.description: - haproxy_server_up = Current health status of the server (1 = UP, 0 = DOWN).
panels.title: Server Status: $node

panels.description: - haproxy_server_weight = Current weight of the server.
panels.title: Server Weight: $node

panels.description: - haproxy_server_downtime_seconds_total = Total downtime in seconds.
panels.title: Server Downtime (s): $node

panels.description: - haproxy_server_check_duration_milliseconds = Previously run health check duration, in milliseconds
panels.title: Health Check Duration (ms): $node

panels.description: - haproxy_server_check_failures_total = Total number of failed health checks.
panels.title: Failed Health Checks: $node

panels.description: - haproxy_server_current_session_rate = Current number of sessions per second over last elapsed second.

panels.description: - haproxy_backend_http_responses_total = Total of HTTP responses.
panels.title: Error - HTTP Response Codes Ratio (4xx, 5xx): $node

panels.description: - haproxy_server_http_responses_total = Total of HTTP responses.
panels.title: HTTP Response Codes (Total): $node

panels.description:
- haproxy_server_bytes_out_total = Current total of outgoing bytes.
- haproxy_server_bytes_in_total = Current total of incoming bytes.
panels.title: Throughput IN/ OUT (Bytes): $node

panels.description:
- haproxy_server_retry_warnings_total = Total of retry warnings.
-  haproxy_server_response_errors_total = Total of response errors.
- haproxy_server_redispatch_warnings_total = Total of redispatch warnings.
panels.title: Response Errors/ Redispatch Warnings/ Retry Warnings: $node

panels.description: - haproxy_server_connection_errors_total = Total of connection errors.
panels.title: Errors Connection: $node

panels.description:
- haproxy_server_current_queue = Current number of queued requests assigned to this server.
- haproxy_server_max_queue = Maximum observed number of queued requests assigned to this server.
panels.title: Number of queued requests assigned to this server (Current/ Maximum): $node

panels.description:
